sentence.Network_en: A pigeon emerges, wings flapping noisily, from the tower.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只鸽子从塔里钻出来，扑扑地拍打着翅膀。

sentence.Network_en: She was slim and muscular and full-breasted.
sentence.Network_cn: 她身材苗条但结实，乳房丰满。

sentence.Network_en: Double-breasted suits went out years ago.
sentence.Network_cn: 双排扣的套装好多年前就过时了。
